properties.title: Welcome to the AJF Injection Developer Website

body.section:
This module contain the AJF code to handle injection. It is implemented as a CDI Extension. In this module you will find Producers (@Produce), Interceptors (@InterceptorBinding) and injectable beans for the core functionalities of AJF. This include :
Logger producer
AuditData producer
Cache producer
Configuration properties producer
Mail producer
Cache interceptor
Monitoring interceptor
Handler management
The Injection module is organized with the following sub modules :
ajf-inject-api : Contain the class/interfaces/annotation visible to the end users
ajf-inject-impl : The CDI extension module.
ajf-inject-tests : The integration tests using Arquillian.
The following aggregated reports are availables : javadocs, sources
